import React, { useState } from 'react' const TaskCard = (props) => { const { title , id, handleUpdate, handleDelete, index, status, setTasks, setFiltered, tasks} = props const [queryTitle, setQueryTitle] = useState(title) const [edit, setEdit] = useState(false) const handleCheck = () => { let newArr = tasks newArr.splice(index, 1, {...tasks[index], status: !status}) setFiltered(newArr ) setTasks(newArr ) } return ( <> {!edit && (
{title}
)} { edit && (
{ setQueryTitle(e.target.value) }} />
)} ) } export default TaskCard
